snippet: If there is a rivalry between the two, it is by many measures a mismatch. But that hasn’t stopped the salivation at the story line: Netflix, the Silicon Valley interloper, taking on HBO, the establishment player.
abstract: Competition between upstart video streaming service Netflix and established cable network HBO is energizing television medium and giving producers incentive to take creative and financial risks, leading to upward spiral in quality; Netflix has encouraged public perception of rivalry, seeing any direct comparison to HBO as good for business.

byline.original: By DAVID CARR and RAVI SOMAIYA

lead_paragraph: If there is a rivalry between the two, it is by many measures a mismatch. But that hasn’t stopped the salivation at the story line: Netflix, the Silicon Valley interloper, taking on HBO, the establishment player.

headline.main: Punching Above Its Weight, Upstart Netflix Pokes at HBO
headline.print_headline: Punching Above Its Weight, Upstart Netflix Pokes at HBO
